name: Pizza Factory Tycoon
description:
Decreasing food standards has increased the demand for exotic cheese! Many new tycoons have emerged, thinking that pizzas is the best solution to fill the cheese craving of the world. Each tycoon with their secret pizza recipe is getting in on the gold rush and sell as many pizzas as they can.

Bake pizzas, build cloning centers, hire truck drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced pizza city in the world.

An incremental clicker game at its core, Pizza City Tycoon uses many elements from clicker and simulation games that give it a one of kind feel. Enjoy the 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a cluster of pizzas. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient pizza city.

More experienced incremental clicker players and players familiar with Mindstorm Studios simulation games will love the new gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a huge pizza city with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Pizza swarm!
- Hundreds of research items
- Hundreds of missions
- Many different brewing centers and shipping vehicles
- An elaborate Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3D graphics
